name: Roller Ball Z - Red ball 2021
description:
Do you like fun puzzle adventure games? Welcome to Roller Ball Z. This game is designed for you!
Planet earth is controlled by evil minions. They want to squeeze the planet into a square. And Roller Ball Z is here to save the world from the evil Square ball that wants to destroy and turn planet earth from round to square.
Let Roller Ball Z save the world!
In this adventure game, your mission is to control Roller Ball Z rolling and jumping your way to avoid the evil obstacles in its path. Use the arrow keys to move the bouncing ball to the target. Jump on the bad guys to destroy them.
Roll, jump and toss the ball rolling through a wasteland. Collect all the yellow stars and items to go on your adventure. Lead the red ball through difficult traps and defeat all the evil minions.. Roll with the highest precision to advance through each area safely!
As you complete levels and collect fruit, you can become even more powerful with available power-ups that can be upgraded or purchased in the in-game store
HOW TO PLAY:
+ Use the right and left arrow keys to roll the ball
+ Use the up arrow key to jump the ball
+ Use the down arrow key to prevent the ball from bouncing against dangerous obstacles.
+ Get the required number of gold stars when the ball rolls
+ Find the magic door to guide the ball by going to the next level
FEATURE:
- Beautiful colorful graphics
- Various evil monsters to fight with: SpitShooter, Spider, Pointed Cactus
- Simple yet addictive gameplay
- Physics based platformer with amazing levels filled adventure.
- Smooth and best possible graphics with optimized size.
Roller Ball Z is a stress reliever game that is one of the most addictive and fun games with increasing complexity of challenges. Download Red Ball 8 now. Let's start the ball adventure to discover all the amazing rolling ball challenges!
